name: Jason Industries
short_description: Jason Industries, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an industrial manufacturing company in the United States, Germany and rest of Europe, Mexico, and internationally.
long_description: Jason Industries, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an industrial manufacturing company in the United States, Germany and rest of Europe, Mexico, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Industrial and Engineered Components. It offers industrial brushes, polishing buffs and compounds, abrasives, and roller technology products under the Osborn name. The company also provides engineered upholstered, foam-in place static, and suspension seating solutions, such as motorcycle seats, operator seats, and power sports seats under the Milsco brand. It serves aerospace, automotive, construction, engineering, plastic, steel, hardware, welding, agricultural, shipbuilding, industrial equipment, motorcycles, lawn and turf care, and power sports end markets. Jason Industries, Inc. was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
